description: Period of continued fraction for sqrt(n) contains exactly three 1's.
references: Kenneth H. Rosen, Elementary Number Theory and Its Applications, Addison-Wesley, 1984, p. 426 (but beware of errors!).
mathematica: Select[ Range@ 1900, !IntegerQ[ Sqrt@ #] && Count[ ContinuedFraction[ Sqrt@ #][[2]], 1] == 3 &] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 03 2011 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
